body.name: Britax Willow Brook S+ Baby Travel System, Infant Car Seat and Stroller Combo with Alpine Base, ClickTight Technology, SafeWash Insert and Cover, Sand Onyx
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 3 hrs 40 mins
features: INFANT CAR SEAT AND STROLLER COMBO: The Britax Baby Travel System includes the Willow S infant car seat, Alpine base and Brook+ Modular baby stroller
INSTALL CONFIDENTLY: Rear facing car seat with ClickTight technology so you know it can be installed securely in your vehicle on the first ride and beyond
FIND THE PERFECT FIT: The RightSize system provides adjustment points at the hips, shoulders and between the legs to help you find your baby's fit
SPACESAVER DESIGN: The Willow S infant car seat is rear-facing only, suitable for 4 to 30 lbs and SpaceSaver has a slim outside and spacious inside
FOUR WAYS TO STROLL: The Brook+ toddler stroller is suitable for children from birth up to 50 lbs with a reversible toddler seat
WASHER AND DRYER FRIENDLY: The SafeWash car seat cover and stroller insert only are naturally flame-retardant and safe to machine wash and dry
PROTECTIVE CANOPY: The water-resistant canopy is UPF 50+ and has a flip-down sunshade and peek-a-boo window for cruising on sunny or rainy days
QUICK-PUSH LATCH CONNECTORS: Helps the car seat lock into place during installation with a click and is easily released with the push of a button—store within the base when not in use
BASE-FREE STABILITY: Baby stroller and car seat combo has an extra belt path on the back of the seat for security when installing without the base
SMOOTH STROLLING: All-wheel suspension makes it easy to roll right over most surfaces and no-flat tires keep your rolling smoothly
body.description: Find your own pace as a parent with the Britax Willow Brook S+ Baby Travel System. This infant car seat and stroller combo include the Willow S baby car seat, Alpine base and Brook+ stroller. It's a rear facing car seat with ClickTight technology that installs securely on the first ride and beyond. The RightSize system provides adjustment points at the hips, shoulders and between the legs to help you find your baby's perfect fit. The one-step fold lets you pack up and go with trunk space to spare. This lightweight stroller offers four ways to stroll, with a reversible toddler seat that switches from parent-facing to forward-facing. The stroller comes with a large cargo basket, a water-resistant canopy, a parent tray and a child snack tray. The Willow Brook S+ infant travel system pairs trusted car seat safety with a fully loaded travel stroller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love love LOVE it!!
reviews.reviewText: First time mom here!! I did ALOT of research for our first stroller car seat combo, and I was surprised how sturdy and lightweight this one is! It took me less than 30 mins to unpack and put everything together. The padding in the car seat is soft, and the storage at the bottom is the perfect size. The stroller itself is easy to turn, clipping and unclipping the car seat is simple. Overall this is the best for the price! 🤩

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Just arrived today. Easy to set up. The car seat is very nice and plushy. The stroller rolls very easy and even holds my big yeti! Definitely worth the buy. Have officially tested it out as I have three more months before she gets here.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Set this up days before I went into labor and it was super easy! Easy to install base in car and car seat is super easy to get in and out of base! Also stroller is very easy switch out between car seat and stroller attachment! Very happy with this purchase for me and baby! Also baby seems to love being in car seat which is a plus!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ready for adventure
reviews.reviewText: I think I could ride this down a steep hill as a full grown man. The build quality is surprisingly good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good system, little issues
reviews.reviewText: This is a great system to have when you first start your family, since it comes with both the car seat and the stroller. It was packed great and easy to remove from the huge box it came in. It was easy to put together - except for the back wheels of the stroller, which had these foam pieces attached to the rods that I couldn't figure out how to remove. Once I figured it out it was just operator error! This is an all-around quality set. Here are some pros and cons:Stroller: The materials used are quality materials. Stitching and cloth are very sturdy and nice. The stroller is padded, but could be a little more thickly padded where the baby's head tends to lean against the stroller when they fall asleep. I put a little towel there to cushion our little guys head. The canopy could come down a little further to shield the baby from the sun. Note that the canopy is different - it is folded back under and you need to reach under and pop it towards you to bring it out, which offers more coverage from the sun (but still not quite enough). I will say that the straps were frustrating to elongate, but I got it done. Also, the "ride" is very bumpy, but it is a stroller not a jogger. I LOVE that the actual seat can be lifted and turned around to either face you or face outward. This is an easy process I appreciate. The buckles are very secure and somewhat hard to click together (I have to put my glasses on). The seat can be reclined or, for an older toddler, set up so the child is in a sitting position. There is a latch on the back of the seat that is easily used to create either of these positions. This stroller comes with a front tray for the child and a back tray for the care giver. Both are very nice. There is adequate storage under the stroller, but not big enough to store a full diaper bag. All-in-all, the pros of having this stroller negate the cons of the stroller and I am enjoying strolling my little guy around. He finds it comfortable enough that he routinely snoozes in it.Car seat: This piece of the set is much easier to review since it is what it is! It's a great car seat with lots of cushion and great 5 point harness protection. You can remove the cushy inserts to wash them if needed. The base sits easily on your cars seat and has a "leveler" so you can ensure the seat is sitting in its correct position. I had problems with the straps, but honestly, I have problems with all car seat straps (which can be adjusted). The seat clicks into place easily. A cool thing about this system is that you can click the car seat onto the stroller so you don't have to remove your little one from the car seat if they've fallen asleep.System: I will add that this stroller is not light weight. At least not for this 57 year old who keeps her one year old great nephew every week! It is a little cumbersome for me to collapse, so I tend to make sure I have all that done prior to getting my great nephew (I leave the stroller ready to use in my garage). If we are out and about, I make sure to pull the stroller from my car trunk before I get my little guy out and get everything set up prior to removing him from his car seat - as I need both hands to complete the stroller process.This system has been great for me in my "new position" :-) . I love having the ability to take my little guy places and show him the world. I would recommend this and would definitely buy it again.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Carseat travel set
reviews.reviewText: Its so beautiful love the look and quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light and maneuverable
reviews.reviewText: Love the stroller! It was super easy to set up and no additional items are needed such as a cup holder or snack tray. The carrier is light weight and sleek.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing quality and so easy to assemble!
reviews.reviewText: My husband and I bought this in preparation for our son, and let me tell you, it is incredible!First off, the packaging isn’t overly complicated and you aren’t looking for all these bits and pieces.The padding for the infant car seat is so soft! And the toddler portion of the stroller is separate so you don’t have to lug around both pieces until your child is ready for just the toddler seat. It’s lightweight compared to some of the other models and it’s super easy to fold up!All in all, we are very happy with the purchase and we can’t wait to see our little one riding in style with this sleek and SAFE travel system.
